speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is he. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: This is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I'm calling regarding your account. Can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you. I can now discuss your account. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250.

speaker: Customer
text: I see, what are my options for payment?

speaker: Agent
text: You can pay in full today or set up a payment plan. What would work best for you?

speaker: Customer
text: I think I can pay half today and the rest next month.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I can set that up for you. Would you like to use the same payment method as last time?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! Your payment plan is set. Thank you for taking the time to resolve this.
